Articles.Content:
Just wondering if there has been any official word on whether the console versions, when released, will also have a demo? I have a few friends that only play on Xbox and I've been telling them about KSP.

Personally I think there should be a demo for consoles. I feel like the price for the full game is completely worth it, but may turn a few people away if they've never heard of it or haven't been able to try it for themselves.
